description: Denominators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(527).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,0,1056,0,0,0,-1).
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[1,1,22,23,1034,1057,23231,24288]; [n le 8 select I[n] else 1056*Self(n-4)-Self(n-8): n in [1..30]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jan 12 2014
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
